website_summaries.verdict: If you need a smooth, creamy, and delicious peanut butter, Jif delivers.
pros: Not gritty like some other brands
Has just a hint of molasses for taste
cons: May be a little too sweet for some palates

customer_reviews.title: Jar Arrived with Lid Off
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but the jar arrived with the lid popped off, and at this point there's almost no recourse other than throwing the product away. Amazon says it's "not eligible for return" and I don't want to use it after it sat in the box with no lid on for two days. I bought this because the price was so much better than what you see in the grocery store, but it's not worth it if it's going to arrive damaged and Amazon provides no way of rectifying the situation.
customer_reviews.author: RJHuf

customer_reviews.title: Had dead bugs in it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a peanut butter fanatic, and Jiff is my favorite. I This was my first Prime Pantry order. My Jiff had dead bugs in it. I eat it straight from the jar. I scooped out a teaspoon and ate it. I felt something in my mouth; I spit it out and found dead bug carcass. Uggg. I threw the jar away.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B

customer_reviews.title: My go to peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: Texture is creamy and smoothie. Great for dipping pretzels, cookies, celery, or just making lunch sandwiches for the kids. Goes great on toast, crackers, and all other snacks. Although we use a lot of peanut butter in our house over time, the 40oz jar is massive and will last us a long time. Great consistency, flavor, and shelf life. Probably not very healthy with the added sugar, but a good substitute over other "snacks". If you found my review helpful, please vote below so I can improve my future reviews for people like you. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Back to the best!
customer_reviews.text: Being both vegan and health conscious for decades, I tried all the natural peanut butters out there. They are all the same ~ 2 inches of oil on top and 2 inches of cement on the bottom, no matter how well you try and stir them up. Plus, the taste is dreadful and the consistency ruins most recipes. I decided to go back to my childhood favorite. I forgot just how good it is. It's Jif for me, from now on.
customer_reviews.author: giabella

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Jif is our favorite peanut butter. My kids prefer smooth and I prefer crunchy. With the coronavirus outbreak, it has been difficult to find Jif in stores. It was nice to find both smooth and crunchy available on Amazon at a good price. Jif Creamy peanut butter is smooth and tasty. The jar I received has an expiration date of almost 2 years out. Although I do not have a Pantry membership, by placing a $35 order of Pantry products, I received free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P

customer_reviews.title: This is a prohibited product by the FDC and cannot be sold in the US since June 18, 2018
customer_reviews.text: This product is dangerous because it was made with hydrogenated oils which are quite capable of affecting your circulatory system in many ways. We Americans already have the highest rate of coronary disease in the World and this product makes it worse. Now Bezos does not allow a return, well Jeff we just might get a divorce over this issue. Jeff must not allow your vendors to sell products that can cause harm, Henry Henry
customer_reviews.author: Julius Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter, a food group
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, crunchy, matters not to me. I am a Jif aholic. I eat tons of peanut butter, it is probably my favorite food in the whole world, in fact I think it should be a food group. I know this isn't the healthier "natural" peanut butter but it is soo much easier to eat that I'm willing to sacrifice. And I love the taste of Jif and how nice and smooth and creamy it is!
customer_reviews.author: whosaysidontcook

customer_reviews.title: Superior Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter blows Skippy out of the water with its barely perceptible yet game-changing hint of molasses. We don't buy any other peanut butter now that we have tried the superior flavor and thick smooth consistency of Jif. Plus, it's made with real peanuts. Just writing this review is making me crave a PB&J.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about sheerness but I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate sheerness because I was not sure how that applied to the product. I used to use only the crunchy stuff but as age caught up with me I had to switch to creamy due to dentures. LOL I ONLY buy Jif (unless in an alternate universe, then I buy Jiffy) and this is a great price for the product. Forgive the humor, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Zugore

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging due to covid 19
customer_reviews.text: I feel these were price gouged due to covid 19 when I bought them. I’ve never paid so much for Jif Peanut Butter ever. And it arrived melted with the oil in a pile at the top of the jar. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: After using another brand since I was a kid, I gave Jif a try out of pure curiosity. I really figured there would be no difference. Peanut butter is peanut butter, right? Wrong! This is the best peanut butter ever. The texture is melt in your mouth, the flavor is like fresh peanuts -- it's divine. Try it on celery, apple slices, rice cakes or right out of the jar, you will absolutely fall in love with this brand of peanut butter. Delivery from Amazon is so much better than lugging it home. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Peanut Butter!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this peanut butter. This is a huge container. This is a great value, delivered right to my door! I am a pedestrian who has to walk my groceries home. This is really nice to be able to have some staples just delivered right to my door, and then I just buy the fresh stuff and carry it home.
customer_reviews.author: islander

customer_reviews.title: Large size has a different flavor
customer_reviews.text: I got this size thinking it will save me a trip to the store too often. It worked, but the flavor is different than the smaller bottles. I'm not sure why that is. This one is more oily which separates from the spread and the flavor is a bit off. I'm still not sure if I will get this size again or stick to the smaller ones
customer_reviews.author: Arby186

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: My family has always preferred the flavor and consistency of Jif. It is smooth and creamy. It spreads easily. It smells and tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good Yum Yum LOL How do you write a review on Jif Creamy Peanut Butter? Everybody in the country knows it cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ronp30014

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have it a lower rating due to the packaging. Very poorly packaged for delivery. The box was half open, smashed and there was so padding in the box. Peanut better was otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked if peanut butter especially the creamy kind. It makes for a good late-night snack and the protein did I don't get in other Foods I get with peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: LADYBUG

customer_reviews.title: Still A Family Go-To
customer_reviews.text: Remains as a go-to snack on celery stalks as well as for PB&J picks.
customer_reviews.author: CynMA

customer_reviews.title: Jif, the best peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: over the years I have tried different brands of peanut butter, even to making my own and I always return to Jif. which is saying a lot as I use to like Skippy before they changed something. Its all about taste and Jif is where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyanna DeTuathana

customer_reviews.title: Jif is the best & price can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Love Jif & use nothing but to make peanut butter fudge I sell in my gift shop. I was thrilled to find this at such a great price. Shipping dept, however, needs to be more careful when packing this product. I ordered two 2-packs & two jars were smashed. There was nothing to protect the jars inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: NOM NOM NOM
customer_reviews.text: it's peanut butter, if you don't love it, you're probably some underevolved creature that will die if you come in contact with this delicious spread of the gods.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite peanut butter for years
customer_reviews.text: my favorite peanut butter for years. those who eat "natural" peanut butter might say i like it because it is sweet, but it's alright with me. i don't think anyone ever got fat from eating only peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a large size of Jif
customer_reviews.text: My Jif was very fresh and was the real thing; delicious and creamy with no off flavors. The price and packaging for shipping were outstanding from Amazon Pantry. I’m very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: and so it is the perfect addition for my lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I know the commercial say that choosy moms choose Jif, but I'm not a very choosy mom. That being said, this is the only peanut butter I will use. It is creamy and delicious and my little one actually eats it. Peanut butter is full of healthy fats when eaten in moderation, and so it is the perfect addition for my lifestyle.

customer_reviews.title: Jif is our favorite peanut butter!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If I was still baking cookies I would use this kind of peanut butter - but instead I eat a tablespoon of this product when I need to add a fat to lunch or dinner - it's such a treat~

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: My favorite peanut butter! Have used it for years. On apples, cucumber slices, toast, crackers, you name it. Great peanut flavor. Good price on Amazon.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in great condition. Good product for long term storage and an excellent source of protein (seven gems per serving).

My preference is for the creamy but the extra chunky is good too if you like the crunch. Great value compared to prices at local grocery store as well so a win-win for me.

As for the taste, it's more sweet than Open Nature Natural Peanut Butter, which has more of an actual peanut taste. Plus, I couldn't find a large tub of that brand. If you need a regular amount of peanut butter, though, then go for less than 40 oz., since you don't want to throw away half of your purchase.

customer_reviews.title: my husband loves it so much i have to buy lots of jars.

customer_reviews.title: Choosy
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat as much peanut butter as I did as a kid, but when I do, I only like JIF. It is smooth, tastes good and doesn't contain xylitol. This is also great for making peanut butter cookies. I guess it's okay for dogs & birds too, but I would rather use Trader Joes plain unsalted/unsweetened peanut butter for feeding any kind of critter. Save​ the really good stuff for yourself.

It gets warms and melty,...yum!

customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: My 'go to" food .
customer_reviews.text: Take a step back to your childhood. Can anything be more satisfying than dipping a spoon in the eanut butter jar?????
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Mason

product_meta.title: Jif Creamy Peanut Butter, 40 Ounces, 7g (7% DV) of Protein per Serving, Smooth, Creamy Texture, No Stir Peanut Butter
product_meta.description:
Spread the love! It’s easy to do with our Jif Creamy Peanut Butter, full of that mouthwatering fresh roasted peanut taste you know the whole family enjoys. No other peanut butter will do, so it’s a no-brainer that you’ll enjoy this classic peanut butter taste paired with jelly or create your own show-stopper snack with a quick spread on veggies or fruit. Just one bite of this smooth, creamy peanut butter will remind you of your best childhood memories. From a brand that has been trusted for generations, Jif Creamy Peanut Butter is That Jif’ing Good, making it perfect for a variety of recipes from simple sandwiches to delightful baked goods, dolloped on celery, or just on its own in spoonfuls straight from the jar. Plus, this peanut butter is gluten free, contains no artificial preservatives and has 7g protein (7% DV) per serving*, so you’ll definitely want to keep the goodness going and stock up on this good stuff. *See Nutrition Information For Fat And Saturated Fat Content **Certified NSF Non-GMO True North by NSF International




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :6.6 x 3.8 x 3.8 inches; 2.5 Pounds
 * Item model number :10000253
 * Date First Available :April 22, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Jif
 * ASIN :B00I8G7268

 *
